config node node
    option public_ipv4_avail '333'
    option local_ifname 'eth0'
    option mac_prefix16 '0x06ab'

fields.help_text:
This file is the private key for the management overlay. 
Notice that the node public key will be automatically updated and your node will lose connectivity to the management network until the new image is not installed.

This file contains the certificate for node authentication.
Please notice that this depends on the RSA keys generated for the tinc overlay, so you must also select the rsa_key.priv if you want a certificate. Also if there is any node.certificate it will be overwritten.
